alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Bremerton and Vicinity; Everett and Vicinity; Hood Canal Area; San Juan County; Seattle and Vicinity; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 22 at 1:49AM PST until December 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor tidal overflow flooding possible around high tide this morning. * WHERE...San Juan County, Western Whatcom County, Western Skagit County, Everett and Vicinity, Admiralty Inlet Area, Hood Canal Area, Seattle and Vicinity and Bremerton and Vicinity. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of lots, parks, and roads near the beaches is possible with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide at Seattle and Port Townsend is around 8 am and at Friday Harbor and Cherry Point is around 9 am. High tide this morning is expected to be around a foot above the tide table predictions.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
